attributes.action: Make it compulsary for all websites collecting sensitive data to use secured conection (HTTPS) instead of none secure (http)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All the web sites which are collecting sensistive data via nonesecure connection to the server are in danger of theft.
Even before data has even reached the destination server.

Therefore this pettition has suggested all of such site to use https which uses SSL or better encryption algorythms.

And as part of Data protection act it has already been in the rules, but needed to be enforced.
attributes.creator_name: Farough Khodadadi MSc, BSc Hons, MBCS CITP, MIET
